## Description {#details}

Entry point for configuring and running IR mutations.

## Public Member Functions

### mutateModule() {#a46815db3771a03cb8892981fd9649760}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IRMutator::mutateModule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, int Seed, size&#95;t MaxSize)</>}>
Mutate given module.

No change will be made if no strategy is selected.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="M">module to mutate</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Seed">seed for random mutation</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MaxSize">max module size (see getModuleSize)</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
